item.title: 最高法院周三同意就前总统唐纳德-特朗普干预 2020 年大选的指控是否可以被起诉做出裁决，并为快速解决问题设定了方向。
item.description:
The Supreme Court on Wednesday agreed to decide whether former President Donald Trump can be prosecuted on charges he interfered with the 2020 election and set a course for a quick resolution. pic.twitter.com/huPlvJ5nGx

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 纽约州州长已经批准了新的国会选区地图，这可能会为民主党在美国众议院的争夺战带来些许助力。

item.title: 来自美联社档案：理查德-刘易斯（Richard Lewis）谈与多年好友拉里-戴维（Larry David）的合作。这位以神经质、意识流表演和 "遏制你的热情"（Curb Your Enthusiasm）角色而闻名的喜剧演员于周三去世。享年 76 岁。
item.description:
From AP’s archives: Richard Lewis on working with longtime friend Larry David.

The comedian known for his neurotic, stream-of-consciousness act and "Curb Your Enthusiasm" role died Wednesday. He was 76. pic.twitter.com/ohLEC0PCfd

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 28, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：美国最高法院将决定唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）是否可以干涉选举的罪名被起诉，并表示将迅速采取行动。
item.description:
BREAKING: The U.S. Supreme Court will decide if Donald Trump can be prosecuted on election interference charges, indicating it will move quickly. https://t.co/5De7K9V9C1

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 距离政府关门还有几天时间，国会正抓紧时间达成协议。但对乌克兰的援助却停滞不前

item.title: 纽约市一家家具店被非法改建成 40 多名移民的寝室，现已被市政官员关闭。
item.description:
A New York City furniture store that had been illegally converted into sleeping quarters for more than 40 migrants has been shut down by city officials. pic.twitter.com/2wpyGuanIq

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：纽约上诉法官驳回了唐纳德-特朗普提出的暂停4.54亿美元民事欺诈罚款的请求，但停止了其他一些制裁措施。
item.description:
BREAKING: A New York appellate judge rejects Donald Trump’s request to pause the $454 million civil fraud penalty but halts some other sanctions. https://t.co/soDAfmNbZw

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 马克-沃尔伯格（Mark Wahlberg）说，通往狗心脏的路是通过它的胃。在拍摄 "亚瑟王 "时，他给他的狗搭档喂了菲力牛排。
item.description:
Mark Wahlberg says the way to a dog's heart is through its stomach. He fed filet mignon to his canine co-star while filming "Arthur the King." pic.twitter.com/tijahdsmRJ

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 28, 2024

item.title: 黑人历史月被认为是美国历史最悠久的有组织历史庆祝活动之一，几十年来，美国总统一直通过公告和庆祝活动来认可这一活动。
item.description:
Black History Month is considered one of the nation’s oldest organized history celebrations, and has been recognized by U.S. presidents for decades through proclamations and celebrations.

Here are four things to know about its origins. pic.twitter.com/yXAhG3O7au

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 米奇-麦康奈尔（Mitch McConnell）是历史上任职时间最长的参议院领袖，他在共和党近 20 年的剧烈动荡中始终保持着自己的权力，他将于 11 月卸任参议院领袖一职。
item.description:
Mitch McConnell, the longest-serving Senate leader in history who maintained his power in the face of dramatic convulsions in the Republican Party for almost two decades, will step down from that position in November. pic.twitter.com/pVvcvPTmzZ

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 28, 2024

item.title: Cierra Ramirez 在《The Fosters》中度过了五年，又在《Good Trouble》中度过了五年，随着该剧的结束，她对未来的项目也有了自己的目标。
item.description:
After spending five years on "The Fosters," and an additional five years on "Good Trouble," Cierra Ramirez has goals for future projects as the show comes to an end. pic.twitter.com/BFXBVP2M2R

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 28, 2024
